definition: Cruciferae or Brassicaceae (taxonomic family including Brassica etc whose flowers have a cross of 4 petals)
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: And did you ever wonder where the term "cruciferous" originates?
sentences.chinese: 你曾經好奇過‘十字花科’這個名稱是怎麼來的嗎？

sentences.english: Other edibles yield gas still includes the vegetable of the mustard family such as onion.
sentences.chinese: 其他產氣食物還包括洋蔥等十字花科蔬菜。

sentences.english: Many insects use crucifers as hosts.
sentences.chinese: 許多昆蟲以十字花科植物爲寄主。

sentences.english: Cruciferous vegetables are those in the mustard or cabbage family, and the list is exhaustive. Unfortunately, most U.
sentences.chinese: 十字花科蔬菜是芥菜或捲心菜家族的所有成員。

sentences.english: A preliminary study on the isozymes of several species of Cruciferae.
sentences.chinese: 幾種十字花科蔬菜的同功酶研究。

sentences.english: The cabbage beetle, Colaphellus bowringi Baly is a serious pest of crucifers in Taian city Shandong province.
sentences.chinese: 在山東泰安大猿葉蟲是十字花科蔬菜上的重要害蟲。

sentences.english: Aphid is one of the maininjurious insects of Cruciferae vegetable.
sentences.chinese: 菜蚜是十字花科蔬菜的主要害蟲之一。

sentences.english: Source: The dicotyledonous plants for the cruciferous plants Ximing the whole plant.
sentences.chinese: 爲雙子葉植物藥十字花科植物菥蓂的全草。

sentences.english: A member of the cruciferous family of vegetables, it is recognized as possessing cancer-fighting properties.
sentences.chinese: 十字花科成員之一的蔬菜，被公認擁有抗癌功能。

sentences.english: Main Used for the prevention and cure of the Cruciferae vegetable vegetables green insect.
sentences.chinese: 主要用於十字花科蔬菜菜青蟲的防治。

sentences.english: Old World genus of the family Cruciferae.
sentences.chinese: 舊大陸十字花科的一個屬。

sentences.english: Cruciferous vegetables are those in the mustard or cabbage family, and the list is exhaustive. Unfortunately, most U.S. markets only carry a few: cabbage, broccoli, kale and collards.
sentences.chinese: 十字花科蔬菜是芥菜或捲心菜家族的所有成員。

sentences.english: Brassica A genus of plants of the cabbage family (Brassicaceae) that includes many vegetables and fodder plants.
sentences.chinese: 十字花科的一屬植物，包括許多蔬菜和草料植物。

sentences.english: Diamond back moth Plutella xylastella(Hnnaeus) has become a main pest of Cruciferae.
sentences.chinese: 小菜蛾己成爲十字花科的主要害蟲。

sentences.english: An introduction to the morphological terms of Cruciferae.
sentences.chinese: 十字花科植物外部形態的簡介。

definition: Asteraceae or Compositae (composites), a large family of dicotyledonous plants producing scents, includes aster, daisy and sunflower
Umbelliferae or Apiaceae, plant family containing carrot, coriander etc
Amaranthaceae, family of herbaceous plants containing Chinese spinach (Amaranthus inamoenus) 莧菜
rosette bok choy (Brassica rapa var. rosularis)
